overview: Having gained more than 20 years of experience by working in different countries in various industy verticles, Chandrashekhar founded CompuBee Technologies Pvt. Ltd. During his career, Chandrashekhar has worked in various capacities in the USA, Japan, India, Phlippines, Indonesia. He has experience in diverse industry verticles such Automobiles and Ancillieries, Engineering, White Goods manufacturing, Pharmaceuticals, Packaging, Media (Television) and Construction / Infrastructure.
